Hts DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTTO BE KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY. ^ ^It is requested that special care may be taken toensure the secrecy of this document.COPY HO, /9WAR CABINET,DESPATCH OP AIRCRAFT TO POLAND.Note by the Secretary.The attached telegrams are circulated for theconsideration of the War Cabinet at their Meeting-tomorrow at 11,30 a.m. :-Annex 1* Telegram from M. Daladier to thePrime Minister dated 8th September? 1939,Annex II, Telegram from the Prime Minister toMe Daladier dated 8th September? 1939,(Signed) E,E* BRIDGES0Secretary,Richmond Terrace? S.W.1. ,8th September? 1939D
AITiMEX I. 'Le 8 septembre 1939.je vous prie de bien vouloir communiquer d'urgence lemessage suivant a Monsieur Chamberlain:"En raison de 1'interet capital pour la Coalition d1assureret de maintenir le Front Oriental, je vous prie instammentd'examiner favorablement les possibilities de renforcer1'Aviation en Pologne par prelevement sur la R.A. F. De mancote, o'ai mis a la disposition de la Pologne 50 avions et centtonnes de bombes. Les Polonais ont pris livraison desavions a Bunker que et des bombes a Marseille.s i gne: DALADIER.SECRET.No. 1011 - D.N
ANNEX II.TBLEGRAM FROM PRIME MINISTER TO" M. DALADIER.In reply to your telegram of the 8th Septemberin regard to possible reinforcement of the Polish AirForces the following are now in the Mediterranean on seapassage to GQNSTAMZA. 15 modern fighters of the latesttype and V medium bombers? together with the necessaryspare parts, special motor vehicles, machine guns, parachutes,6,000 tons of bombs, and 2,750,000 rounds of ammunition^Transport ship passed GIBRALTAR September 3rd, andeverything possible will be done to expedite it.29 bombers of same type as above, together with further consignments of necessary equipment, are being prepared for immediate despatch. We are examining thepossibility of overland transit to MARSEILLES and shipmentfrom these, in order to expedite delivery and reduce risks of loss at sea8 in which event I will ask you to do allin your power to facilitate rapid rail transit acrossFrance.2-
